name: (By)Cycle
description:
The end is near ... The world is collapsing and you have to go through this test to survive.  

Pedal as fast as you can or the void will catch you

How to play ?

- Forward : Mash 'O' and 'P'
- Left / Right : 'Q' / 'D'
- Shift gear up / shift gear down : 'Z' / 'S'
- Jump : 'Space'

There are some bonuses and obstacles on the road be careful /!\

Credits:  
  - Main menu music : 0ldm4nn - Runner
  - Game music : ZeRo-BaSs - *Hot Desire*
  - 3D Chara : QuaterniusDev
  - 3D Bike : Elvair Lima
